title: Laptop Utilization and Collaborative Learning Strategies in 1:1 Classroom Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computer Literacy and General Science Curriculum Knowledge
context.additional_context: Focuses on practical collaborative learning strategies for pre-service teachers to use when designing science lessons in primary and secondary schools. Requires an approach combining smartphone-based activities and offline collaborative tasks due to limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more collaborative learning scenarios using various student-laptop configurations (1:1, 1:2, 2:2)
Learners develop two or more blended collaborative tasks that integrate smartphone-based tools with offline activities
Learners identify and apply five or more laptop utilization strategies to promote collaborative learning in science subjects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
